import React from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import './index.scss'; import PDF from "../../assets/images/Federico Dordoni CV resume 2023 Dev.pdf"; import Navigation from '../Navigation'; import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; const Resume = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate'); useEffect(() => { return setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover'); }, 3000); }, []); return ( <> < Navigation />

I'm a freshly graduated full stack developer looking for an exciting career change, and for an opportunity to work with the latest technologies, including React, Node.js, and MongoDB or any Blockchain related projects.

I'm naturally extrovert, always curious, and constantly teaching myself a new skill, reading a new book, or outdoor exercising. Oh, and coding of course!

My family is my biggest motivation, and I'm always looking for ways to improve myself and my skills to provide them with a better life. I love cooking (sounds cliche, but I do!), and I'm always looking for new recipes to try. When I'm not coding, you'll find me outdoor exercising, taking photos, or playing with my son.

); }; export default About; {/*

Resume

Technical Skills

  • Languages: JavaScript, HTML, CSS
  • Computer Science applied to JavaScript: Algorithms, Efficiency, Time Complexity, Big O Notation, Data Structures
  • Libraries/Frameworks: React, jQuery, Bootstrap, HTML, Bootstrap, Handlebars, Local/Session Storage, IndexedDB
  • Server Side Development: Node.js, Express.js, User Authentication, Progressive Web Applications (PWAs), MERN Stack
  • API Interaction: API, JSON, AJAX, REST
  • Databases: MongoDB, MySQL
  • Quality Assurance: Unit Testing, Functional Testing, Linting, Continuous Integration
  • Tools/Platforms: Git, GitHub, Heroku

Education

Diploma in Business Management

Australian Pacific College, 2009-2012

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

Work Experience

Assistant Category Manager

Endeavor Group Pty Ltd (Dan Murphy's), 2020-present

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

Something else

2023

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

Proficiencies

  • HTML/CSS
  • JavaScript
  • M ongoDB
  • Express
  • React
  • Node.js
  • SQL
); } // Export Resume export default Resume; */}
